name: Block (itch) (AviaEyal, talbrauner, Arnon Guttel)
description:
Stop the monsters , Defend the base! 

Gather 2-4 players and play using any bluetooth controller.

Developed by Tal Brauner and Arnon Gutel

Design by Michal Shatz and Avia Eyal

This game was made as part of "Bezalel academy of art and design" & "The Hebrew  University" Game jam
